content: the everyday summer hat pattern worsted weight version is always free on my blog 1 this pattern is great for adventurous beginners the pattern uses us terms and is worked in the round from the top down it uses lion brand 24/7 cotton in succulent approximately 270 yards you can use any worsted weight yarn that is comparable to the recommended yarn for this pattern you also need about 50 inches of plastic hat brim wire also known as millinery wire this pattern is designed to fit most teen/small adult to medium adult with 21 -23 inches head circumference i hope that you get to make one for yourself or for your friend s for any questions please don t hesitate to contact me happy crocheting 1 https //stringsandcuddles com/
